main.node: Pass Through When No Previous Jobs - Util
Check LinkedIn Company URL Present - IF
Get Profile Company Posts - Subflow Apify
Set Website Processed - No Website - Set1
Set Website Processed - No Website - Set
Triggers  > Apify > Web Scraping Create a Task
Get Person Details - AT by RecID
Prepare Company LinkedIn Inputs - Subflow Util
Prepare Company LinkedIn Inputs - Subflow Util1

name: Processing > LinkedIn > Analyze People and Companies with AI [2000]

nodes.name: Prepare Previous Job Data - Set
nodes.notes: PHASE: Configuration | Purpose: Prepare the field payload for previous jobs summarization by selecting and normalizing required properties. | Inputs: Airtable fields fullName, jobTitle, companyName[], previousJobs, and id. | Outputs: Item with fullName, jobTitle, companyName (first element), previousJobs, and recId. | Dependencies: Output of 'Get Person Details - AT by RecID' and its schema. | Special Cases: Assumes companyName is an array; adjust mapping if schema changes.

nodes.name: Get Profile Posts - Subflow Apify
nodes.notes: PHASE: Execution | Purpose: Invoke the child workflow that triggers Apify to collect the target profile's LinkedIn posts (fire-and-forget). | Inputs: recId and linkedinLink prepared by the upstream Set node plus execution context. | Outputs: No immediate payload due to waitForSubWorkflow=false; main flow continues. | Dependencies: Subflow 'Boost Research — Processing > Sub > Linkedin Profile Posts > Apify' and Apify credentials/config in that subflow. | Special Cases: Branch should only run when linkedinLink is present; subflow may throttle per Apify limits and handle its own errors.

nodes.name: Prepare LinkedIn Inputs - Subflow Util
nodes.notes: PHASE: Configuration | Purpose: Prepare recId and linkedinLink fields used to invoke the LinkedIn posts subflow. | Inputs: Output of 'Get Person Details - AT by RecID' for recId and current item for linkedinLink. | Outputs: Item with recId and linkedinLink ready for downstream execution. | Dependencies: Airtable People record from the prior node. | Special Cases: If linkedinLink is absent the IF guard must prevent execution; consider trimming/validating URL.

nodes.name: Prepare LinkedIn Inputs (Reactions) - Set
nodes.notes: PHASE: Configuration | Purpose: Prepare shared fields recId and linkedinLink for the LinkedIn reactions subflow. | Inputs: Airtable-derived recId and existing item.linkedinLink. | Outputs: Item with recId and linkedinLink standardized for downstream. | Dependencies: Output of 'Get Person Details - AT by RecID'. | Special Cases: Execution is gated by the IF that checks linkedinLink presence; consider URL normalization.

nodes.name: Get Profile Reactions - Subflow Apify
nodes.notes: PHASE: Execution | Purpose: Invoke the subflow that collects LinkedIn profile reactions via Apify (non-blocking). | Inputs: recId and linkedinLink prepared upstream. | Outputs: No immediate data due to waitForSubWorkflow=false. | Dependencies: Child workflow 'Boost Research — Processing > Sub > Linkedin Profile Reactions > Apify' with its own credentials and limits. | Special Cases: Branch should only run with a valid linkedinLink; downstream subflow handles throttling and errors.

nodes.name: Generate Connection Message - Subflow LinkedIn
nodes.notes: PHASE: Execution | Purpose: Invoke the subflow that generates a LinkedIn connection message for the target person. | Inputs: recId and linkedinLink from the preparation Set node; optional context drawn by the subflow. | Outputs: No immediate result since waitForSubWorkflow=false. | Dependencies: Child workflow 'Boost Research — Processing > Sub > Linkedin Connection Message'. | Special Cases: Branch guarded by IF; subflow should manage idempotency and rate limits.

nodes.name: Prepare LinkedIn Inputs (Connection) - Set
nodes.notes: PHASE: Configuration | Purpose: Prepare shared fields recId and linkedinLink for the LinkedIn connection message subflow. | Inputs: Airtable recId and current item.linkedinLink. | Outputs: Item containing recId and linkedinLink for downstream use. | Dependencies: Output of 'Get Person Details - AT by RecID'. | Special Cases: Execution should be gated by IF when linkedinLink is absent or invalid.

nodes.name: Check Previous Jobs Present - IF
nodes.notes: PHASE: Utility | Purpose: Gate downstream summarization based on whether previousJobs exists and is non-empty. | Inputs: Person record from Airtable including previousJobs. | Outputs: True branch when previousJobs exists and not empty; false branch otherwise. | Dependencies: Output of 'Get Person Details - AT by RecID'. | Special Cases: If the field type or path changes this condition must be updated.

nodes.name: Check LinkedIn URL Present - IF
nodes.notes: PHASE: Utility | Purpose: Guard LinkedIn-related branches by checking that linkedinLink exists and is not empty. | Inputs: Current item fields including linkedinLink and Airtable-derived context. | Outputs: True branch when linkedinLink exists and is not empty; false branch routes to the NoOp sink. | Dependencies: Upstream Airtable and Set nodes that populate the field. | Special Cases: Optional URL format validation could prevent downstream failures.

nodes.name: LinkedIn Processing Entry - Util
nodes.notes: PHASE: Utility | Purpose: Provide a visual and logical entry marker for the LinkedIn processing segment. | Inputs: Airtable person item from the previous node. | Outputs: Pass-through item to IF and Set nodes. | Dependencies: None. | Special Cases: Organizational only; removal does not affect logic.

nodes.name: Pass Through When No Previous Jobs - Util
nodes.notes: PHASE: Utility | Purpose: Provide a pass-through path when previousJobs is missing or empty so the flow can complete gracefully. | Inputs: Items routed from the IF node false branch. | Outputs: Pass-through items for optional logging or subsequent handling. | Dependencies: None. | Special Cases: Replace with an error handler if missing previous jobs should fail the run.

nodes.name: Summarize Previous Jobs - Subflow LinkedIn
nodes.notes: PHASE: Execution | Purpose: Invoke the child workflow that summarizes the person's previous jobs for downstream LinkedIn use cases. | Inputs: fullName, jobTitle, companyName, previousJobs, and recId prepared by the Set node. | Outputs: Summary text or structured insights as returned by the subflow. | Dependencies: Subflow 'Boost Research — Processing > Sub > LinkedIn Summarize Previous Jobs' and any AI provider credentials therein. | Special Cases: Only called when previousJobs exists; consider retries and rate limit handling within the subflow.

parameters.content:
## People Analyse Workflow

This workflow orchestrates a **People Analyse** process:

1. **Trigger**  
   - Receives a webhook with an Airtable record ID.

2. **Data Retrieval**  
   - Fetches the person’s details from Airtable.

3. **Pre-Processing**  
   - Guards on the presence of:
     - A LinkedIn URL
     - Previous job data  
   - Prepares normalized inputs.

4. **LinkedIn Research** *(if LinkedIn URL is present)*  
   - Fire-and-forget subflows to:
     - Collect profile posts and reactions via **Apify**.
     - Generate a connection message.

5. **Job-History Summarization** *(if previous jobs exist)*  
   - Prepares relevant fields.
   - Invokes a subflow to summarize them.

6. **Design Approach**  
   - Emphasizes quick completion of the main run using asynchronous subflows.
   - Integrates:
     - Airtable
     - Apify
     - Likely an AI service in the summarization subflow.

nodes.name: Check LinkedIn Company URL Present - IF
nodes.notes: PHASE: Utility | Purpose: Guard LinkedIn-related branches by checking that linkedinLink exists and is not empty. | Inputs: Current item fields including linkedinLink and Airtable-derived context. | Outputs: True branch when linkedinLink exists and is not empty; false branch routes to the NoOp sink. | Dependencies: Upstream Airtable and Set nodes that populate the field. | Special Cases: Optional URL format validation could prevent downstream failures.

nodes.name: Prepare Company LinkedIn Inputs - Subflow Util
nodes.notes: PHASE: Configuration | Purpose: Prepare recId and linkedinLink fields used to invoke the LinkedIn posts subflow. | Inputs: Output of 'Get Person Details - AT by RecID' for recId and current item for linkedinLink. | Outputs: Item with recId and linkedinLink ready for downstream execution. | Dependencies: Airtable People record from the prior node. | Special Cases: If linkedinLink is absent the IF guard must prevent execution; consider trimming/validating URL.

nodes.name: Get Profile Company Posts - Subflow Apify
nodes.notes: PHASE: Execution | Purpose: Invoke the child workflow that triggers Apify to collect the target profile's LinkedIn posts (fire-and-forget). | Inputs: recId and linkedinLink prepared by the upstream Set node plus execution context. | Outputs: No immediate payload due to waitForSubWorkflow=false; main flow continues. | Dependencies: Subflow 'Boost Research — Processing > Sub > Linkedin Profile Posts > Apify' and Apify credentials/config in that subflow. | Special Cases: Branch should only run when linkedinLink is present; subflow may throttle per Apify limits and handle its own errors.

nodes.name: Prepare Company LinkedIn Inputs - Subflow Util1
nodes.notes: PHASE: Configuration | Purpose: Prepare recId and linkedinLink fields used to invoke the LinkedIn posts subflow. | Inputs: Output of 'Get Person Details - AT by RecID' for recId and current item for linkedinLink. | Outputs: Item with recId and linkedinLink ready for downstream execution. | Dependencies: Airtable People record from the prior node. | Special Cases: If linkedinLink is absent the IF guard must prevent execution; consider trimming/validating URL.

nodes.name: Missing LinkedIn URL - DONE
nodes.notes: PHASE: Utility | Purpose: Provide a clear sink for items where the LinkedIn URL is missing so the workflow path is explicit. | Inputs: Items from the IF node's false branch. | Outputs: Pass-through items for optional logging or safe termination. | Dependencies: None. | Special Cases: Consider swapping with an Error node if missing URL is considered a hard failure.

nodes.name: NO LinkedIn URL - DONE
nodes.notes: PHASE: Utility | Purpose: Provide a clear sink for items where the LinkedIn URL is missing so the workflow path is explicit. | Inputs: Items from the IF node's false branch. | Outputs: Pass-through items for optional logging or safe termination. | Dependencies: None. | Special Cases: Consider swapping with an Error node if missing URL is considered a hard failure.

nodes.name: Get Person Details - AT by RecID
Set Website Processed - No Website - Set
Set Website Processed - No Website - Set1
Triggers  > Apify > Web Scraping Create a Task
nodes.notes: PHASE: Execution | Purpose: Invoke the child workflow that triggers Apify to collect the target profile's LinkedIn posts (fire-and-forget). | Inputs: recId and linkedinLink prepared by the upstream Set node plus execution context. | Outputs: No immediate payload due to waitForSubWorkflow=false; main flow continues. | Dependencies: Subflow 'Boost Research — Processing > Sub > Linkedin Profile Posts > Apify' and Apify credentials/config in that subflow. | Special Cases: Branch should only run when linkedinLink is present; subflow may throttle per Apify limits and handle its own errors.
